content.text:
HON. CHERI BUSTOS

                              of illinois

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 8, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mrs. BUSTOS. Mr. Speaker, on the Legislative Day of November 7, 2017, 
a series of votes were held. Had I been present for the first of these 
roll call votes, I would have cast the following vote:
  Roll Call 613--I vote YES.
content.speaker: Mrs. BUSTOS
